programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tries to locate a kidnapped girl but has to contend with her grandfather, a former member of a disbanded special forces unit. The agents discover he has been secretly negotiating with the kidnapper, who was once in his undercover team and has decided to kill off his old colleagues in a bid to atone for their actions. Meanwhile, Abby is forced to work with an intern, and makes him follow her idiosyncratic rules. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called to the home of a bomb disposal expert who shot and killed an intruder during a robbery. The case appears to be straightforward until Tony discovers she lied about being alone during the incident, and the evidence suggests a link to a case in which a man walked free after paralysing a member of the public in a shootout. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team becomes involved in an international incident when the body of an American petty officer is found by an estate agent in a bungalow that has been repossessed. An indentation on the victim's skull leads the agents to believe he was killed on a British ship, but collecting evidence from the vessel proves challenging. Guest starring Tracy Middendorf, Daniel Gillies and Kristen Ariza

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis try to solve the murder of a college student whose death was depicted in graphic detail on the internet. However, the investigation grinds to a halt when they encounter a lawyer who is unwilling to reveal vital information about her client's past

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An investigation into the murder of a prostitute leaves an eminent plastic surgeon as the most obvious culprit. However, Kincaid suspects otherwise, and sets out to discover whether the man was framed

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Curtis helps a woman who claims her baby was kidnapped while she was at confession to retrace her steps. However, legal questions begin to appear when her attorney introduces a unique defence. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A baby is found dead in his cot, and reports indicate he was poisoned. All the evidence pins the blame on a British au pair employed by the parents, but she claims the infant's death was a result of the mother's negligence. Sam Waterston stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe, Curtis, McCoy and Kincaid witness the execution of a criminal they helped bring to justice, but the event culminates in personal tragedies for each of them

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the abduction and murder of a teacher, and later discover it's possible that she knew the culprit. Having arrested one of her students, the courts quickly decide their evidence is inadmissible - but it seems another assailant could be to blame. Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Homicide police hand the case of a retired marine colonel found murdered with an axe over to NCIS when they are unable to solve the case, despite all the circumstantial evidence pointing to the deceased's drug-addicted son. They discover the suspect's mother went missing two years previously and Ziva suggests he may have killed more than one parent, while the family's neighbour is revealed to also have had a motive for wanting the man dead. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly and Cote de Pablo

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a marine working for the Defence Intelligence Agency who was blamed for the disappearance of 500 specialised rifles in Afghanistan. A cryptic message found at the scene, written in the victim's blood, leads the agents on the trail of a controversial manuscript that claims to expose the truth about the missing weapons, and an FBI agent with a secret. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents examine the death of a seaman and find themselves working alongside Barrett. Gibbs makes his displeasure about the circumstances of the case well known, prompting the rest of the investigators to worry that he might be about to leave the NCIS again. Meanwhile, Ziva introduces her new boyfriend to her team-mates. Crime drama, guest starring Enrique Murciano

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi tries Richard Wheatley for the murder of Kathy Stabler. Benson finds herself at odds with a friend when Barbs agrees to take the case

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Nichols and Wheeler investigate the murder of a famous socialite, who had enraged her celebrity chef boyfriend by failing to respond to his offer of marriage. The detectives discover large amounts of clothing in her home given to her by a club owner and former rapper, and interview a man who would sit alone at the bar the victim frequented and intently watch anyone who got close to her. Crime drama, guest starring Liam Aiken and Anthony 'Treach' Criss

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Beck arrest a homeless man on suspicion of the rape and murder of a woman and her 10-year-old daughter - only to find he is actually Munch's estranged uncle Andrew (guest star Jerry Lewis). As the case proceeds, a new suspect is identified, but the evidence against him is thrown out in court - and events build to a tragic conclusion. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Connie Nielsen

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A rapist begins to escalate his crimes, attacking victims more than once - and Dr Huang suspects he has a particularly disturbing motive for targeting them. However, tensions flare between Stabler and Beck as they make a difficult decision to help catch whoever is responsible. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A student's body is found dumped in an area frequented by prostitutes, and it soon becomes clear she was deeply involved in the worlds of online gambling and high-stakes poker. As the investigation proceeds, Stabler and Tutuola find themselves on the trail of a famous American footballer and an undercover police officer. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Ice-T

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney is kidnapped during an investigation into a home invasion that left four members of the same family murdered. However, a further killing prompts McCoy to put his career on the line to track down the culprits. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterston and Annie Parisse

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: A chain-store owner claims his business has dwindled because of his trial and acquittal for the murder of his wife - and he blames Jessica, who has mentioned him in one of her books. Angela Lansbury stars, with guest appearances by George Segal, Morgan Fairchild and Julianna Margulies

American drama, starring Michael Weatherly, with Nadia Bjorlin

Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette

Guest starring Robert Wagner

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis uncover new evidence as they investigate a 30-year-old rape and stabbing case, but the victim is consumed with fear when confronted with the possibility of another trial for the perpetrator

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The death of a show-horse leads the team to investigate a woman's disappearance, and the subsequent trial brings to light a possible insurance scam and a sting operation

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A case is reopened after five years when a copycat killer begins claiming victims, but investigations become complicated when one of McCoy's old assistants accuses him of forging evidence that helped put an innocent man behind bars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a lift, and McCoy finds his prosecution of the prime suspect hampered by a vindictive judge Ross offended in court

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A student is found stabbed to death in his flat, and a college friend is soon named prime suspect - but she claims the victim was a stranger who used a date rape drug on her. However, it soon emerges that the crime could have been racially motivated. Drama, with Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the murder of a rare coin dealer, focusing their efforts on a millionaire who seems the most likely culprit - but Ross finds himself forced to play detective too. Sam Waterson and Jerry Orbach star

programme.desc: A Navy lieutenant is found dead in the Pentagon's custodial closet, and surveillance footage indicates she was killed by a co-worker. However, Ziva and the team discover her supposed assailant actually died of a heart attack days before the crime was committed. Meanwhile, suspicions are raised regarding the eyeball left in Tony's drink, and the investigators' attention is fixed on the port-to-port murderer, who appears to still be at large

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony's one-time Baltimore PD partner Danny Price is murdered in a manner that suggests the port-to-port killer has struck again. However, a key difference in the way the victim was bound suggests the crime was actually the work of a copycat, forcing the investigators to consider whether Price had any enemies

programme.title: NCIS

A lead from Barrett's squad reveals the CIA has also been tracking the murderer - and its findings suggest the culprit could be an even deadlier foe than anticipated

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part story, Prentiss's connection with Doyle is revealed as she finds herself the main target in a revenge mission. The worried policewoman finds it difficult to conceal the truth about her troubled past, while her colleagues try to halt the criminal's killing spree

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Part two of two. Prentiss's colleagues finally realise her connection to the murderous Ian Doyle, resulting in a dangerous mission that puts everyone's lives at risk as they encounter Irish mobster Fahey and a corrupt former ally. Drama, starring Paget Brewster

Learning the victim was one of several girls working for a pimp named Victor, the pair set about convincing the others to testify against him. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

With little evidence to go on, the detectives struggle to find enough information to close the case and stop a potential attack in the city. Crime drama, starring Jesse L Martin and Milena Govich

programme.desc: Laurel narrowly escapes a brutal attack while out jogging on campus, and when a van containing photographs detailing Pride's every move is discovered, it becomes clear Laurel has been entangled in a vindictive plot against her father. With Laurel's safety now in question, Sonja takes her to a safehouse, while Pride makes the ill-advised decision to get personally involved in the investigation. The team immediately assumes the attacker is affiliated with the militia that has been at odds with Pride for a while, and an interrogation of the group's imprisoned leader Zed reveals Pride and his family are not the only people being followed. With no other information forthcoming, the team must determine the identities of the other victims before they come to any harm. Naval crime drama, starring Scott Bakula

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A naval psychologist is found dead in close proximity to the route of a traditional New Orleans second-line funeral procession. When the agents investigate, they discover the victim had been secretly photographing the parade, and LaSalle is attacked by an unknown assailant. Delving further into the mysteries surrounding the case, the team uncovers a complex plot involving the founder of New Orleans, grave robbers, and what seems to be a dead man walking

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: The events of Febtuary 25, 2009, when Turkish Airlines Flight 1951 went down less than a mile from the runway at Amsterdam Schiphol Airport, breaking into three pieces on impact and killing nine passengers and crew and all three pilots. A faulty radio altimeter was the initial catalyst in a chain of errors that led to the horrific crash. Here, survivors tell their story of escaping from the wreckage of what should have been a normal commute home to Amsterdam

The Reds had defeated the likes of Stoke City, Chelsea and Manchester City to reach the final and went into the match as clear favourites in their first visit to the national stadium since it was rebuilt. However, the Bluebirds, who defeated Crystal Palace on penalties in the semi-finals, had been in good form in the Championship and will have fancied their chances of producing an upset
